title: Dave Hughes speaks candidly about his friendship with Lindsay Lohan
text:
Despite reports of a feud, Dave Hughes has confirmed he's actually 'good friends' with Lindsay Lohan.

Appearing on The Project on Monday, the 48-year-old comedian opened up about his unlikely camaraderie with the 33-year-old Hollywood starlet after they appeared on The Masked Singer together.

'Me and Lindsay Lohan are really good friends. Can I say that? I was driving in the country yesterday and my phone rang and it was Lindsay Lohan,' he laughed.

Close: Despite reports of a feud, Dave Hughes (pictured) has confirmed he's actually 'good friends' with Lindsay Lohan during his appearance on The Project on Monday night

Dave said Lindsay is set to return to Australia for the Melbourne Cup next month, and they've already made plans to catch up.

'She's coming for the Melbourne Cup, so we're going to hang out,' he added, before saying he wouldn't hesitate to 'put her up' at his house.

Earlier this month, Dave denied rumours he was feuding with the actress while speaking on his radio show, Hughesy & Kate.

Good friends: The 48-year-old comedian opened up about his unlikely friendship with Lindsay Lohan (centre) after they appeared on The Masked Singer together. Pictured alongside (L-R) Osher Gunsberg, Jackie 'O' Henderson and Dannii Minogue

He said they frequently texted each other, even when they weren't at work.

Also appearing on Hughesy & Kate, Lindsay described her Masked Singer colleagues as being like 'family'.

'We're family, we're all on a group chat, we're all friends,' she said earlier this month.

Chats! 'Me and Lindsay Lohan are really good friends. Can I say that? I was driving in the country yesterday and my phone rang and it was Lindsay Lohan,' he laughed

Dave even recounted being invited up to Lindsay's hotel room to party with his friend, fellow comedian Nazeem Hussain.

Despite having been sober for 25 years, Hughesy said he went and bought a '$100 bottle of wine', with the pair then making their way up to Lindsay's hotel room.

Confessing it was 'expensive', Hughesy said he was keen to 'impress' Lindsay, even though he had no intention of drinking the wine.
description: Despite reports of a feud, Dave Hughes has confirmed he's actually 'good friends' with Lindsay Lohan.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
